noWebUsb.message: This browser does not support Web USB or Web USB is not enabled.
noWebUsb.suggestion: Use a supported browser such as Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.

suggestion1.windows: You may need to manually install a USB driver before you can connect to your hub.
suggestion1.linux: You may need to add udev rules before you can connect to your hub.

noDfuHub.suggestion2: Click the button below for more information.

noDfuInterface.message: This is very unusual. The USB device did not contain the expected interface.

firmwareMismatch.message: Cannot flash firmware. The firmware file is for a different kind of hub.

releaseButton.message: You may release the power button on the hub now.
